Dynamic Models LoadingÂ¶

DartCMS package contains some useful apps, like news, feedback, shop etc. If you plan to redeclare these apps, you can load models from these apps via get_model function:

from dartcms.core.loading import get_model

Page = get_model('pages', 'Page')

First argument of this function - label of application. Second - name of model class. This function checks if you have registered app named pages and then, if you have, returns you model Page.
